metadata.source: Willis Towers Watson - Job Matching Guide 2023 / GGS User Guide 4.2
metadata.description: Regras UNIFICADAS de Survey Grades, Career Bands e Filtros Hierárquicos. Substitui ambos os JSONs anteriores.

wtw_reporting_limits.description: Survey Grade Máximo permitido para o cargo subordinado (GG deve ser ESTRITAMENTE MENOR que este limite, baseado na sobreposição de bandas).

EX.label: Executive (EX) / Banda 6/5BS/5FS
EX.description: Roles primarily involved in the development and approval of long-term vision. Survey Grade 15-25.

M.label: Supervisory / Management (Banda 4M/3M)
M.description: Implements organization strategies through effective direction and management of resources. Survey Grade 10-17.

P.label: Professional (Individual Contributor)
P.description: Performs work in a specialized area of expertise requiring college degree or equivalent knowledge. Survey Grade 8-17.

U.label: Business Support (Clerical/Admin)
U.description: Performs clerical, administrative or specialized support tasks; may require vocational training. Survey Grade 4-9.

W.label: Production / Manual Labor
W.description: Performs unskilled or semi-skilled work. Survey Grade 2-8.
